definitions.definition: the fact of living in a place.
examples: a government ruling confirmed the returning refugees' right to residency

definitions.definition: a residential post held by a writer, musician, or artist, typically for teaching purposes.
the official residence of the British governor general's representative or other government agent, especially at the court of an Indian state.
a group or organization of intelligence agents in a foreign country.
a period of specialized medical training in a hospital; the position of a resident.
